a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of males vs females with developmental intellectual disabilities,
The estimated share of the population with an idiopathic developmental intellectual disability, which can include delayed or
impaired speech, language, motor condition, and visuospatial skills.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
